stories.headline: Drilling for lease deals
stories.summary: An investigation into oil and gas leasing on federal lands during the Bush administration, revealing potential benefits to industry insiders and the complexity of the leasing process.

stories.headline: Diving deep into marine park problems
stories.summary: A detailed examination of the marine park industry, uncovering issues with animal deaths and inadequate care based on data from the Marine Mammal Inventory Report.

stories.headline: Data helps probe death on the tracks
stories.summary: The investigation focuses on rail-crossing safety following an accident involving CSX personnel, highlighting issues with deactivated safety circuitry and maintenance practices.

stories.headline: Reservation deaths uncovered with data
stories.summary: An investigation revealing high child mortality rates on the Warm Springs Reservation, attributed to problems within the tribal welfare system and lack of public accountability.
